Nokia Lumia 430


Important Note


We CANNOT SIM unlock this device in house

Flashing


  1. Open the device folder from the flash files server
  2. Run the FullFlash.bat file
  3. connect the powered off device to the system and flashing will begin
  4. When complete the screen of the device will turn green
  5. Disconnect the battery or hold Volume Down and Power to reboot the device
